Key Match Events: Cook Islands 1-3 Tonga in World Cup Qualifiers
Viliami Tikoipau scored the first goal for Tonga in the 27th minute
Hemaloto Polovili scored the second goal for Tonga in the 39th minute
Taci Kundos scored the third goal for Tonga in the 80th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Cook Islands were coming off a 1-0 win over Tonga in their last match
Tongas were looking to redeem themselves after a poor recent performance
The match was the first direct qualifier for Oceania to the 2026 World Cup
Both teams had poor recent form entering the match
Post-Match Reflections: Cook Islands ended their streak with the loss
The match was significant for both teams' World Cup qualification hopes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at J.S. Blatter Football Complex Tuanaimato Field 1
Tupapa's Taylor Saghabi and Tonga's Hemaloto Polovili were key players
The match was followed by live updates and analysis on VAVEL
